div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 141px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 141px; margin-left: 472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 51px; margin-left: 166px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
第一步
1. 用密值A2构建交易并发送给B签名。
2. 收到B的签名后把密值A1传给B。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 141px; margin-left: 942px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 49px; margin-left: 633px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
第二步
1. 用密值B2构建交易并发送给C签名。
2. 收到C的签名后把密值B1传给C。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 239px; margin-left: 639px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
第三步
1. 用密值C2构建交易并发送给B签名。
2. 收到B的签名后把密值C1传给B。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 244px; margin-left: 160px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
第四步
1. 用密值B'2构建交易并发送给A签名。
2. 收到A的签名后把密值B'1传给B。
